rule.Name: AvoidUnusedParametersRule
rule.problem: The method contains one or more unused parameters.
rule.solution: You should remove or use the unused parameters.

target.Name: System.Void testapp.Program::Main(System.String[])
target.defect: Parameter 'args' of type 'System.String[]' is never used in the method.

rule.Name: ConsiderUsingStaticTypeRule
rule.problem: This type contains only static fields and methods and should be static.
rule.solution: Change this type into a static (or sealed for 1.x) type gain clarity and better error reporting.

rule.Name: UseCorrectCasingRule
rule.problem: This identifier (namespace, type, or method) violates the .NET naming conventions.
rule.solution: Change the namespace, type, or method name to be pascal-cased (like MyClass) and parameter names to be camel-cased (like myParameter).

target.Name: testapp, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null
target.defect: Namespaces longer than two characters should be pascal cased. Rename namespace 'testapp' to 'Testapp'
